transbit.tbits.api

public interface IRule

Method Detail

execute

RuleResult execute(java.sql.Connection connection,
                   BusinessArea ba,
                   Request oldRequest,
                   Request currentRequest,
                   int Source,
                   User user,
                   boolean isAddRequest)
Execute the Rule.

Parameters:
ba - Current Business area
oldRequest - The previous state of the request. It is generally needed for comparisons.
currentRequest - New Request, the request under processing.
Source - The origin of action. An update can originate from Email, Web Request or Command Line
user - The current user
extendedFields - the extended fields corresponding to the new request. These are just a copy of old variable plus changes done by updates and other rules To Update header description, you can use: currentRequest.setHeaderDescription();
Returns:
The rule result stating whether the processing can be continued and whether the rule was successful.

getSequence

double getSequence()
Gets the Sequence for a Rule. It is double because it make it easier to insert a new rule between two rules.

Returns:
returns the Sequence number at which it should be executed.

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns:
Gets the name of plug-in.
